description:
Oniwaka was the person that worked for http://anidb.net/ch17537 [Sasaki Ryuujirou] and was thought to be an ogre. He was very kind person but due to being tortured and called names because of his appearance, he often went out of control. He has showed compassion towards http://anidb.net/ch4863 [Fuu] when Sasaki tried to kill her.
Source: Samurai Champloo Wiki, edited.
name: Oniwaka
